description:
TableTextCompare is a small utility that allows you to easily compare 2 tab-delimited or
comma-delimited (csv) files, and find out the difference between the 2 files.

You can use this tool for comparing 2 different snapshots of data, created by other 
NirSoft utilities, like DriverView, ServiWin, USBDeview, CurrPorts, WirelessNetView, ShellExView, and
many others...

For example, You can use DriverView utility to save 2 snapshots of loaded drivers list into a tab-delimited file,
and then use TableTextCompare to easily find out which device drivers were added, removed, or changed 
since the time that the first snapshot was taken.
author: Nir Sofer
